text: mariyu milo maranincina varu bharyalanu vadalipote, varu tama bharyalaku oka sanvatsarapu bharanapu kharculu ivvalani, varini inti nundi vedalagotta vaddani vilunama vrayali. Kani varu tamantata tame vellipoyi, tama visayanlo dharmasam'matanga emi cesina mipai papam ledu mariyu allah sarvasaktimantudu, maha vivekavantudu
